Answer Choices:
(a) ignore
(b) enforce
(c) authoritarian
(d) yell at
(e) avoid
A:
rationale:
user
The sentence "They seem to have ignored the attempts of the school to make them better." suggests that the effort was unsuccessful.
Answer Choices: 
(a) Ignore  
(b) Enforce  
(c) Authoritarian  
(d) Yell at  
(e) Avoid
B: Ignoring (A)
C: Authoritative (D)
E: Avoiding (G)
Therefore, the answer is B - Ignoring.
